task.title: Make Dimensions Oblique
task.shortdesc: Extension lines are normally created at a perpendicular angle to the dimension line. You can change the angle of the extension lines, however, so that they tilt relative to the dimension line.

step.cmd: Choose Dimension > Oblique from the main menu.
Select the linear dimension, and then press Enter.

step.info: Type the obliquing angle, andthen press Enter.

result.p: Select the dimension to be made oblique (A), and then type the obliquing angle.
TIP To align the oblique angle if you don't know the exact measurement, use snaps to pick two points on the entity.
